content.question: Which of the following best describes the authorâ€™s perspective?

choices.label: The Russian media lacks the independence it needs to hold President Putin accountable.
International organizations are influential in setting the Russian news agenda.
Russian television stations are privately controlled and mostly anti-Putin.
Oligarchs still own more media outlets than the government.

content.answer: The Russian media lacks the independence it needs to hold President Putin accountable.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Describe the author's claim(s), perspective, evidence, and reasoning.
